org.zeromq

Class Patterns

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zeromq.Patterns

  • public class Patterns
extends Object
    Class containing utility methods for creating objects for different patterns without using a ØMQ Context directly.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BeaconReactorBuilder buildBeaconReactor()
      Create a new BeaconReactor, which will send and receive UDP beacons on a broadcast address, with event-driven handling of received beacons.
      static BinaryStarReactorBuilder buildBinaryStarReactor()
      Create a new BinaryStarReactor, which will create one half of an HA-pair with event-driven polling of a client Socket.
      static BinaryStarSocketBuilder buildBinaryStarSocket()
      Create a ØMQ Socket, backed by a background agent that is connecting to a BinaryStarReactor HA-pair.
      static CloneClientBuilder buildCloneClient()
      Create a new CloneClient, connected to an HA-pair, for publishing key/value data to anonymous peers.
      static CloneServerBuilder buildCloneServer()
      Create a new CloneServer, which will create one half of an HA-pair for distributing key/value data to clients.
      static Socket newBinaryStarSocket(String primaryUrl, String backupUrl)
      Create a ØMQ DEALER Socket, backed by a background agent that is connected to a BinaryStarReactor HA-pair.
      static CloneClient newCloneClient(String primaryAddress, String backupAddress, String subtree)
      Create a new CloneClient, connected to an HA-pair, for publishing key/value data to anonymous peers.
      static CloneServer newCloneServer(BinaryStarReactor.Mode mode, String primaryAddress, String backupAddress)
      Create a new CloneServer, which will create one half of an HA-pair for distributing key/value data to clients.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • buildBinaryStarReactor

        public static BinaryStarReactorBuilder buildBinaryStarReactor()
        Create a new BinaryStarReactor, which will create one half of an HA-pair with event-driven polling of a client Socket.
        Returns:
        A builder for constructing a BinaryStarReactor

      • buildBinaryStarSocket

        public static BinaryStarSocketBuilder buildBinaryStarSocket()
        Create a ØMQ Socket, backed by a background agent that is connecting to a BinaryStarReactor HA-pair.
        Returns:
        A builder for constructing connecting a BinaryStarReactor client Socket

      • newBinaryStarSocket

        public static Socket newBinaryStarSocket(String primaryUrl,
                                         String backupUrl)
        Create a ØMQ DEALER Socket, backed by a background agent that is connected to a BinaryStarReactor HA-pair.
        Parameters:
        primaryUrl - The primary server's url to connect to
        backupUrl - The backup server's url to connect to
        Returns:
        A new Socket connected to an HA-pair

      • buildCloneServer

        public static CloneServerBuilder buildCloneServer()
        Create a new CloneServer, which will create one half of an HA-pair for distributing key/value data to clients.
        Returns:
        A builder for constructing a CloneServer

      • newCloneServer

        public static CloneServer newCloneServer(BinaryStarReactor.Mode mode,
                                         String primaryAddress,
                                         String backupAddress)
        Create a new CloneServer, which will create one half of an HA-pair for distributing key/value data to clients.
        Parameters:
        mode - The server mode (e.g. PRIMARY, BACKUP)
        primaryAddress - The primary server's url to connect to (if mode is BACKUP)
        backupAddress - The backup server's url to connect to (if mode is PRIMARY)
        Returns:
        A new CloneServer

      • buildCloneClient

        public static CloneClientBuilder buildCloneClient()
        Create a new CloneClient, connected to an HA-pair, for publishing key/value data to anonymous peers.
        Returns:
        A builder for constructing a CloneClient

      • newCloneClient

        public static CloneClient newCloneClient(String primaryAddress,
                                         String backupAddress,
                                         String subtree)
        Create a new CloneClient, connected to an HA-pair, for publishing key/value data to anonymous peers.
        Parameters:
        primaryAddress - The primary server's url to connect to
        backupAddress - The backup server's url to connect to
        subtree - The prefix (subtree) to subscribe to
        Returns:
        A new CloneClient

      • buildBeaconReactor

        public static BeaconReactorBuilder buildBeaconReactor()
        Create a new BeaconReactor, which will send and receive UDP beacons on a broadcast address, with event-driven handling of received beacons.
        Returns:
        A builder for constructing a BeaconReactor
